Question: Shenzhen Yingtuo Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yingtuo Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- Shenzhen Yingtuo Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd participated in the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, showcasing its latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies such as artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous driving, robots, and augmented reality.

- The company is accelerating efforts to expand its presence in North America by boosting production capacity at its Mexican factory.

- Shenzhen Yingtuo Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd is at the forefront of technological innovation globally and actively promoting the application of AI in consumer electronics, intelligent devices, and electric vehicles.

- The company has shown potential to lead the industry in mature categories such as smartphones, as well as in emerging fields such as artificial intelligence of things, AR, and VR.
